GALAXY OF SOFTWARES – Grand Theft Auto V Reloaded GTA 5 Free Download Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Overview of Game

Grand theft auto is a game from which everyone is well familiar. This game is one of the best and most famous games in the world in the fighter category. The similar games are known as pubg and fortnite but they have different features than this game.

The main plot of this game revolves around the street criminals who are looting different banks and properties of the people. The US government is after those robbers and trying 6o catch them at any cost. The certain kind of missions are also carried out against them so that they catch them and get all the looted money back. There are some brilliant features of this game which everyone would love to have in a game.

This game is especially designed for the PC users so that they can play on their laptops and desktops. This game is available with 1080p resolution which would be really fun to play on a big screen. This game has a very beautiful 3D graphics which makes the whole game and scenerio look real and original.

Players who like to play the game of fighters and wars involve a great taste in the weapons which this game absolutely contains. There are very well functioning weapons such as the rifltee, machine guns, missiles, guns and a lot more. This game is clearly one of the best fighter games in the world which are exclusively designed for the PC users.

Grand Theft Auto V Reloaded GTA 5 Gameplay Trailer

Grand Theft Auto V Reloaded GTA 5 Gameplay

The plot of this game is all about the thieves who belong to a street crime gang. They loot money and run away from the police. The police is always chasing the criminals and shooting on them. In return, the criminals have to save themselves from getting shot by the police and kill all the cops. As a criminal, you can use a huge range of weapons which are given specifically for the criminals.

You need to shoot all the cops and stay alive till the end of the game. You need to save your friends too in between the fight and yourself from the bullet. The level will end when you or the cops fail the game. In order to win, you have to kill all the cops and run away safely. There are many vehicles provided too in this game so that you may run away from the cops within no time.

This game is a best example of how a crime on the street can happen followed by an encounter among police and the criminals. The gamers who love this game will eventually fall in love with this fifth part of grand theft auto. This game has a bit different features which give a lot more freedom to the players in order to fight well against the police. The unique fefauree and the high resolution graphics are there to make your gaming experience even better. Good resolution will make the game scenerio look like a real tight scene we watch on TV.

Wreckfest System Requirements

GALAXY OF SOFTWARES – Call of Duty Black Ops 2 MP with Zombie Mode Free Download Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Overview of Game

Call of duty is one of those games that has a huge and biggest fan following and is played by millions and millions of people. Call of Duty Black Ops 2 is all about how people are fighting with each other in the current era and how present wars are an amalgamation of lethal technology and heavy weapons. When these two things combine, the destruction is much worse than you thought.

Everyone swears by the graphics of this game. With outstanding quality of features and graphics, if you have not played this game before then, you should definitely give this game a try. Unfortunately, this game is a bit on the hefty side of the price, so if you are a crazy gamer and can spend a good amount of bucks on this game then, you should definitely try this.

You cannot play this game for free. Call of Duty merchandise has been developing excellent quality games since a very long time and all of the versions of call of duty have never disappoint its players. Call of Duty Black Ops 2 is the 9th game that they have launched in the market.

With the crazy fan following, this merchandise keep coming back with much better version of their games. This game has certain age restrictions. So if you are a kid under 16, you cannot play this game. Due to some of the graphics and content in the game, the developers have put age restrictions on it.

Call of Duty Black Ops 2 MP with Zombie Mode Gameplay Trailer

Call of Duty Black Ops 2 MP with Zombie Mode Gameplay

This game is a high paced game and it revolves around a certain time period of past and future. The game shows both the dimensions of past and future. So, in this game you are basically either living in the past or in the future. When you are playing in the past version, you are basically chasing a man who is responsible for keeping in hostage a protagonist in this game named as Woods.

Whereas, if you are playing in the future version, you will get to fight a huge lethal and destructive war. This game is considered to be the first game of Call of Duty merchandise which is showcasing what wars will look like in the future. You can also select your own preferred weapons before starting the game, make sure to select the most powerful weapon for yourself as you will have to face a lot of challenges.

The 3D effects of this game cannot get any better. You can get all the truthful feels through this amazing game. This game was a massive scale in the market. In between 24 hours, the developers have sold millions of copies of it. Although, there are many strict and strong competitors of this game, but all the call of duty lovers would still prefer this game over any other game. So, if you are into war and action genre and get into a serious action then, you should definitely buy this amazing game

These games have the exactly same gameplay and the features like this game apart from a few minor changes. It is a game specifically designed for PC for the Windows users. The …

Galaxy of softwares – FREE FIRE PC Game 2021 Overview Read More »
item.content:encoded:
FREE FIRE PC Game Overview

Free fire PC game 2021 is a well-known fighter game which is called exactly like fortnite and pubg. These games have the exactly same gameplay and the features like this game apart from a few minor changes. It is a game specifically designed for PC for the Windows users. The games like pubg and fortnite have a mobile version for the Android and iOS users but this game has not introduced any mobile version for the users. This game has 50 players as compared to the pubg which allows 100 players at a single time in a battle. The battle also lasts for 15 minutes where the fighter has to keep themselves safe till the battle ends. There are many amazing features and great options to avail in this game. It is a heavy game to be installed in your Windows because of its massive features. There are many vehicles too which you can purchase by using the coins you have earned in this game. This game is available for free so there are no charges for downloading and installing in into your computers. The environment in this game is also different as compared to the other games. There are streets, grounds and a lot more other areas where the fights will be continued. Hence, this game is a great one to give a shot and play in your leisure time. You can also have your friends joined in for the purpose of fighting in a team.

FREE FIRE Gameplay Trailer

FREE FIRE PC Game Gameplay

Free fire PC game 2020 is happened to be a really interesting game which has a lot of amazing features. 50 people can play this game at a time and fight in the form of teams. There are several characters which one can choose to be in this game. There is a whole range of costumes and weapons as well from which the players can choose. There is a big range of weapons and snipers which the players can choose in order to shoot the enemies. You can play this game with your friends and family members too no matter how far they live from you. There are different levels and battles which you can play in order to win more money in this game. This money is used to make the in-app purchases in this game. The beautiful green background of this game makes it even more attractive. The players can get the complete control of the game while using the keyboard and the mouse. It is undoubtedly a brilliant game which contains good controls and best gaming approach. The people who want to try something new but almost similar to the fortnite or pubg, then free fire PC game 2020 is a game especially designed for them. The fighters in this game also get special ranks in it with the superpowers. They can also upgrade their positions by unlocking new costumes and weapons which are made of  high quality elements

DOWNLOAD

Because of the development of this game, people used to play games like fortnite, grand theft auto etc. With the launch of this game, players have found …

GALAXY OF SOFTWARES – PUBG PC Game 2021 Read More »
item.content:encoded:
Pubg is well-known and one of the most growing games in this world. It is a fighter game which is an absolute favorite of every fighter game lover. Because of the development of this game, people used to play games like fortnite, grand theft auto etc. With the launch of this game, players have found so much more and they are eagerly willing to play this game and complete all the challenges.

This game has unique 3D graphics and very amusing features which are hard to find in the fortnite. This game allows you to play with 100 more players at a time. You can play pubg with people living overseas and talk to them. The teams are created and people can fight while communicating with their fellow fighters through voice chat.

This game has good controls which other games lack, this is why many players have switched to pubg and they are playing it all the time. There are beautiful locations and backgrounds in this game which you choose by your own choice.

You become your boss after you win the game by killing all the enemies and staying safe till the end. This is the PC version of the pubg game while the mobile phone version is also available. Some people do not like playing games on their phones that’s why pubg has introduced this PC version to implement a better fighting approach. This game has an amazing gameplay which every fighter player would love to enjoy.

PUBG PC Gameplay Trailer

PUBG PC Gameplay

This game consists of a number of fighter heroes which you can choose in order to play a game. These fighters have different weapons and the costumes which you may choose on your own. You also create a team by adding your friends and family members and fighting against the enemies.

The goal is to target the enemies and kill their whole crew so that you could win and stay safe. You are not supposed to be shot at all because it will automatically lead towards the end of the game with your defeat. The winners get different rewards in this game including a very famous chicken dinner.

There are unique types of weapons such as the rifle, machine guns, pistols, snipers, missiles and many more. Your team members are also not supposed to be shot at all because you will lose the game in this way. The pubg PC game has become very popular and all time favorite of the people because of its such great features.

This game is available for free completely while the in-app purchases could be made by utilizing the money you have earned in winning the fight. Because of this brilliant game features, gameplay and this fantastic overview, teenagers love to take part in the worldwide competition of pubg where they can win and even earn a big prize money. Pubg PC games are literally a dream for the gamers who love to play fighter games and can’t resist over playing it most of the time in a day.

PUBG PC Game System Requirements
